name: incognito-browser
title: Incognito Browser
description: Open any URL in incognito mode using your favorite browser. Supports Quicklinks, deeplinks, and clipboard fallback.
author: c0b41

commands.name: open-incognito
commands.title: Open URL in Incognito
commands.description: Quickly open a URL in incognito or private mode using Chrome, Brave, Edge, Firefox, or Safari. Supports clipboard fallback and deeplinks.

arguments.name: url
arguments.description: If left blank, the command will try to use the clipboard contents or deeplink data.

arguments.name: browser
arguments.description: Choose which browser to open the URL in. Defaults to your preferred browser.

commands.name: open-incognito-deeplink
commands.title: Create Incognito Open Deeplink
commands.description: Quickly open a URL in incognito or private mode using Chrome, Brave, Edge, Firefox, or Safari. Supports clipboard fallback and deeplinks.

preferences.name: defaultBrowser
preferences.title: Default Browser
preferences.description: Set your preferred browser for opening URLs in incognito mode when no browser argument is provided.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
